targets.query: SELECT mean("eventsWithoutTimestamp") AS "eventsWithoutTimestamp", mean("filteredEvents") AS "filteredEvents", mean("sentEvents") AS "sentEvents", mean("calculateScores") AS "calculatedScores" FROM "streaming.scoring.task" WHERE "process" =~ /^$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)

SELECT mean("dataSourceScorerNotFound") AS "dataSourceScorerNotFound" FROM "streaming.scoring.dataSource" WHERE "process" =~ /^$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)

SELECT mean("eventsWithoutTimestamp") AS "eventsWithoutTimestamp", mean("filteredEvents") AS "filteredEvents", mean("sentEvents") AS "sentEvents", mean("calculateScores") AS "calculatedScores" FROM "streaming.scoring.task" WHERE "process" =~ /^$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)

SELECT mean("dataSourceScorerNotFound") AS "dataSourceScorerNotFound" FROM "streaming.scoring.dataSource" WHERE "process" =~ /^$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)

SELECT mean("eventsWithoutTimestamp") AS "eventsWithoutTimestamp", mean("filteredEvents") AS "filteredEvents", mean("sentEvents") AS "sentEvents", mean("calculateScores") AS "calculatedScores" FROM "streaming.scoring.task" WHERE "process" =~ /^$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)

SELECT mean("dataSourceScorerNotFound") AS "dataSourceScorerNotFound" FROM "streaming.scoring.dataSource" WHERE "process" =~ /^$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)

list.label: process
list.name: process
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "streaming.scoring.task" WITH KEY = "process"
